code: import React from'react';import{useSelector}from'react-redux';import{selectRacers,selectTeams}from'./teamMakerSlice';import{msToTime}from'./teamMakerlogic';import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Teams(){var teams=useSelector(selectTeams);var racers=useSelector(selectRacers);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:teams.map(function(team,i){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:["Team: ",i+1," Total Time: ",msToTime(team.total)]}),team.combo.map(function(racer,j){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h4",{children:[racers[racer].name," - ",racers[racer].time]})},j);})]},i);})});}export default Teams;
